# ChangeLog

## v1.0.8
* Protection from unnecessary calls of shell command (getHostName)

## v1.0.7
* Protection from unnecessary calls of shell command

## v1.0.5
* Added COLO detection for k8s deployment

## v1.0.4
* Added `getHostName` for fetching complete host name e.g `somemachine.slc.ebay.com`

## v1.0.3
* Fixed `coloMx` for All environments

## v1.0.2
* Removed unused dependencies

## v1.0.1
* Bumping up dependencies
